definitions.definition: Synonym of dead ( “ those who have died ” ) .
One who has died. In property law , the alternate term decedent is generally used in US English. In criminal law , “the deceased” refers to the victim of a homicide .

main_definition: ( euphemistic ) Synonym of dead ( “ those who have died ” ) .
secondary_definitions: ( law ) One who has died. In property law , the alternate term decedent is generally used in US English. In criminal law , “the deceased” refers to the victim of a homicide .
